blogData.title: A Journey Through Australian Fashion: English To Hindi Video Transcription   And Translation
blogData.description:
In this post, we look at a video from the Museum of Applied Arts and
  Sciences (MAAS) in Sydney, Australia. This video describes the new Centre For Fashion
  at MAAS, and its first exhibit with over 30,000 garments displayed, covering a range
  of fashion styles, from colonial Australia to contemporary Australia.

blogData.coverAlt: A Journey Through Australian Fashion: English To Hindi Video Transcription And   Translation

data.richContent:
This video is from Museum of Applied Arts and Sciences Youtube channel. This video is about the garments and design collection at the Museum of Applied Arts and Sciences (MAAS).

The garment collection covers pieces from the 18th century to present day examples. These are shown at the new Centre For Fashion at MAAS. There are around 30,000 amazing pieces in total, which MAAS hopes will impact and inspire future generations of fashion designers.

The garment exhibit at MAAS’s Centre For Fashion is among the most comprehensive in Australia. The hope behind this new exhibit is to map the cultural impact of fashion, and to document the cultural history of Australia through what people wear.

Steps

  1. Please open your browser and go to videotranslator.ai, and then click on the Login button. On successfully logging into the application, select my template, and create a new item maas.
  2. Upload the video, and trigger the transcribe action. The speakers are from Australia, so we use the Australian English option.
  3. Once the transcribe action is 100% complete, we check the transcription. The AI sometimes misses to capitalisation, comma’s and full stop in sentences. This is because people do not speak the way they write, and in this case, we require the written content to make sense to the translation AI.
  4. We embed the English captions to produce the below. Please watch the video below.
  5. Once the correction in transcription is done, we move to translate the captions. Select ‘Automatic’ for AI translation with language selected to ‘Hindi’ for ‘Video’.
  6. After the translation process is complete, we quickly check the translation and make any corrections.
  7. Once this translation is good, we embed the captions into the video.
  8. All done! Thank you for reading this process of ‘A Journey Through Australian Fashion: English To Hindi Video Transcription And Translation’.

Conclusion

In this post, we have converted a video from the Museum of Applied Arts and Sciences (MAAS), from English to Hindi. We did this by, first transcribing the video in English, then translating the captions into Hindi, and finally embedding the caption content into the video using the Auto-Overlay function.

If you were to post such translated content online, it is recommended to also translate the title, description and other metadata into the target script, in this case Hindi. This will improve your Hindi SEO, allowing native Hindi speakers to find your content online.

Video Translator makes no representation of a relationship with Museum of Applied Arts and Sciences. We are using publicly available content to showcase an interesting use case of our platform.
